document.full_text: li na pinned china on the grand slam map when a confident display of power and accuracy at the french open saturday made her the first player from an asian nation to win a grand-slam title.
document.title: champion li puts china on grand slam map
lines_and_colors: li na pinned china on the grand slam map when a confident display of power and accuracy at the french open saturday made her the first player from an asian nation to win a grand-slam title.
